competitors.name: Marketo
competitors.notes: Founded 2006, major B2B marketing automation platform; acquired by Adobe in 2018

competitors.name: Eloqua
competitors.notes: Founded 1999, early leader in B2B marketing automation; acquired by Oracle in 2012

competitors.name: Pardot
competitors.notes: Founded 2007, B2B marketing automation; acquired by Salesforce in 2013

competitors.name: Constant Contact
competitors.notes: Founded 1995, primarily email marketing with growing automation

competitors.name: MailChimp
competitors.notes: Founded 2001, popular email marketing platform beginning to add automation

competitors.name: Infusionsoft
competitors.notes: Founded 2001, small business marketing automation and CRM

context: By 2010, the marketing automation industry was beginning to take shape. HubSpot had established itself as a pioneer of inbound marketing methodology.
